title: Preserving a Palestinian Identity in the Kitchen
description: With many Palestinians fearful that their cuisine is being lost, kitchen practices handed down by family matriarchs for generations are still being passed along.
dc:creator: Aina J. Khan
media:credit: Samar Hazboun for The New York Times
media:description: Mariam Sindawi in the kitchen of her home, in Haifa, Israel, with her granddaughter Abeer Abbasi. “Our relationship is really based around the kitchen,” Ms. Abbasi said.
